    jQuery(document).ready(function () {

        jQuery.la.authentification.initForm();
        jQuery('#openSearchModal, #openSearchModal2').click(function () {
            jQuery('body').removeClass('opened_burger_menu');
            jQuery('#mySearch').load('/Concours-et-cadeaux/search/modal?site=replay' + ' #search_form', function () {
                               jQuery("#search_form form").attr("action", '//replay.gulli.fr/search');
                jQuery.la.autocompletion.init('replaySearch[searchText]');
            });
        });

                <h2>78 épisodes de Oggy et les cafards en SVOD sur GulliMax</h2>
            </div>
            <div class="owl-carousel">
                                    <div class="item">
                        <a href="//svod.gulli.fr/Plus-grands/Oggy-et-les-cafards4/VOD69024898268000" target="_blank">

                                                                    <span class="episodetitre">Les vertiges de la lecture</span>
                                                            </span>
                        </a>
                    </div>
                                    <div class="item">
                        <a href="//svod.gulli.fr/Plus-grands/Oggy-et-les-cafards4/VOD69024898289000" target="_blank">
                                                        <span class="visuel"><img alt="" src="https://resize-gulli.jnsmedia.fr/rcrop/145,193/img/var/storage/imports/svod/images/463749_1.jpg" class="img-responsive" /><i class="picto-play"></i></span>
                                                        <span class="texte">
                                <span class="infos">S7 ép. 2</span>
                                <span class="vote"><span class="note"><i class="icon-note-on"></i><i class="icon-note-on"></i><i class="icon-note-on"></i><i class="icon-note-on"></i><i class="icon-note-on"></i><span class="result" style="width:90%"><i class="icon-note-on"></i><i class="icon-note-on"></i><i class="icon-note-on"></i><i class="icon-note-on"></i><i class="icon-note-on"></i></span></span></span>
                                                                    <span class="episodetitre">Un trésor bien gardé</span>
                                                            </span>
                        </a>
                    </div>
                                    <div class="item">
                        <a href="//svod.gulli.fr/Plus-grands/Oggy-et-les-cafards4/VOD69024898310000" target="_blank">

                                                        <span class="texte">
                                <span class="infos">S7 ép. 3</span>

                    <div class="container_full">
